VibeKeeper/VibeKeeperApp.swift.description: Initialize the SwiftUI application and set up the main view hierarchy

VibeKeeper/ContentView.swift.description: Render the main content view and handle user interactions

application_initialization.description: Initialize the application and set up its environment

view_hierarchy_setup.description: Set up the view hierarchy of the application

view_rendering.description: Render a view in the application

user_interaction.description: Handle user interactions such as taps, gestures, and input

data_binding.description: Bind data to views and handle data flow

data_persistence.description: Persist data to storage such as Core Data, UserDefaults, or files

networking.description: Perform network operations such as API requests
